summary: Why not? We have Vampires, thought I\'d introduce a Slayer. She is lev 5 and will level with the player. She cannot die cause she\'s the slayer. She is marriageable. Her favorite weapon is the bow and arrows.
descriptionHtml:
Why not? We have Vampires, thought I\'d introduce a Slayer. She is lev 5 and will level with the player. She cannot die cause she\'s the slayer. She is marriageable. Her favorite weapon is the bow and arrows.  She knows allot of skills in archery, and is very  loyal but deadly fighter. She has high sneak skills and archer skills. Sorry no stake, they are not in the game.(yet) 

You will find her walking around Riverwood probably near the Blacksmith area. 

PS MY lighting sucks

WARNING
You must have ApachiiHair running for this mod. Make sure it is before Buffy in the order.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

I Used:

Better Females by Belle  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

Apachii Hair of course

Armour is by Killer Keos http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
author: Lycanheart
